architectural_notes: Admin principal grzx7-efvee-eiav7-cphgh-j7zbs-jju44-7e5zt-embnv-eki5c-gmoof-uqe is hardcoded in main.mo initialization to prevent phantom admin issues during deployment
Admin initialization runs automatically during canister deployment/upgrade, not as a callable function
Removed bootstrapAdmin function and useBootstrapAdmin hook in favor of hardcoded initialization

existing_features.title: Remove bootstrap logic from frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx while keeping the sidebar and all UI exactly as v41
Update the version number displayed in the AppLayout footer from 'v41' to 'v42'

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the bootstrapAdmin function entirely from backend/main.mo

Add hardcoded admin initialization code in backend/main.mo immediately after 'include MixinAuthorization(accessControlState);' that checks if principal 'grzx7-efvee-eiav7-cphgh-j7zbs-jju44-7e5zt-embnv-eki5c-gmoof-uqe' exists as admin in accessControlState, and if not, directly adds them with name 'System Administrator' and role 'Admin' to the same data structure that getAdminEntries reads from
Remove the useBootstrapAdmin hook from the frontend
